channel.title: üè¢ Nanjing University of Science and Technology on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Nanjing University of Science and Technology on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Continuous Heatmap Regression for Pose Estimation via Implicit Neural Representation
item.description: NerPE: continuous heatmap regression via implicit neural representation resolves the accuracy-limiting quantization errors in human pose estimation, achieving sub-pixel precision.

item.title: DCDepth: Progressive Monocular Depth Estimation in Discrete Cosine Domain
item.description: DCDepth achieves state-of-the-art monocular depth estimation by progressively predicting depth in the frequency domain via DCT, capturing local correlations and global context effectively.

item.title: DoFIT: Domain-aware Federated Instruction Tuning with Alleviated Catastrophic Forgetting
item.description: DoFIT: A novel domain-aware framework significantly reduces catastrophic forgetting in federated instruction tuning by finely aggregating overlapping weights and using a proximal perturbation initiali…

item.title: Facilitating Multimodal Classification via Dynamically Learning Modality Gap
item.description: Researchers dynamically integrate contrastive and supervised learning to overcome the modality imbalance problem in multimodal classification, significantly improving model performance.

item.title: IMAGPose: A Unified Conditional Framework for Pose-Guided Person Generation
item.description: IMAGPose: A unified framework generating high-fidelity person images from single or multiple source images & poses, addressing existing methods’ limitations.

item.title: Long-tailed Object Detection Pretraining: Dynamic Rebalancing Contrastive Learning with Dual Reconstruction
item.description: Dynamic Rebalancing Contrastive Learning with Dual Reconstruction (2DRCL) pre-training significantly boosts object detection accuracy, especially for underrepresented classes.

item.title: MambaLLIE: Implicit Retinex-Aware Low Light Enhancement with Global-then-Local State Space
item.description: MambaLLIE: a novel implicit Retinex-aware low-light enhancer using a global-then-local state space, significantly outperforms existing CNN and Transformer-based methods.

item.title: Predicting Label Distribution from Ternary Labels
item.description: Boosting label distribution learning accuracy and efficiency, this research proposes using ternary labels instead of binary labels to predict label distributions, thus enhancing annotation efficiency …

item.title: Progressive Exploration-Conformal Learning for Sparsely Annotated Object Detection in Aerial Images
item.description: Progressive Exploration-Conformal Learning (PECL) revolutionizes sparsely annotated object detection in aerial images by adaptively selecting high-quality pseudo-labels, overcoming limitations of exis…
